00034   MappedContainer<Ahc2Calibrations>* Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::getCalibrations(const std::string& processorName)
00035   {
00036     return _Ahc2CalibrationsContainerMap[processorName];

00044   Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor() : Processor("Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor")
00045   {
00046 
00047     _description = "Processor that provides a MappedContainer of Ahc2Calibrations objects";
00048 
00049     registerProcessorParameter( "MappingProcessorName" ,
00050                                 "Name of the MappingProcessor instance that provides the geometry of the detector." ,
00051                                 _mappingProcessorName,
00052                                 std::string("MyMappingProcessor") ) ;
00053 
00054     registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00055                              "PedestalCollection" ,
00056                              "Name of the pedestal collection"  ,
00057                              _pedestalColName ,
00058                              std::string("pedestal") ) ;
00059     
00060     registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00061                              "MIPConstantCollection" ,
00062                              "Name of the MIP constants collection"  ,
00063                              _MIPConstantColName ,
00064                              std::string("MIPConstants") ) ;
00065 
00066     registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00067                              "MIPSlopeCollection" ,
00068                              "Name of the MIP slopes collection"  ,
00069                              _MIPSlopeColName ,
00070                              std::string("MIPSlopes") ) ;
00071 
00072     registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00073                              "GainConstantCollection" ,
00074                              "Name of the gain constants collection"  ,
00075                              _gainConstantColName ,
00076                              std::string("gainConstants") ) ;
00077 
00078     registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00079                              "GainSlopeCollection" ,
00080                              "Name of the gain slopes collection"  ,
00081                              _gainSlopeColName ,
00082                              std::string("gainSlopes") ) ;
00083 
00084     
00085     registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00086                              "InterCalibrationCollection" ,
00087                              "Name of the interCalibration collection"  ,
00088                              _interCalibrationColName ,
00089                              std::string("interCalibration") ) ;
00090 
00091     registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00092                              "PhysicsCalibICCollection" ,
00093                              "Name of the interCalibration physics calib collection"  ,
00094                              _PhysicsCalibICColName ,
00095                              std::string("PhysicsCalibIntercalibration") ) ;
00096 
00097     registerInputCollection(LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00098                             "SaturationParametersCollection",
00099                             "Name of the saturation parameters collection",
00100                             _saturationParametersColName,
00101                             std::string("SaturationParameters"));
00102 
00103     registerInputCollection(LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00104                             "TimeSlopesParametersCollection",
00105                             "Name of the time slopes parameters collection",
00106                             _timeSlopesParametersColName,
00107                             std::string("TimeSlopes"));
00108 
00109     registerInputCollection(LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00110                             "TimePedestalParametersCollection",
00111                             "Name of the time pedestal parameters collection",
00112                             _timePedestalParametersColName,
00113                             std::string("TimePedestal"));
00114 
00115     /*
00116       registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00117       "TemperatureCollection" ,
00118       "Name of the temperature collection",
00119       _temperatureColName ,
00120       std::string("AhcTemperature") ) ;
00121     */
00122 
00123     registerInputCollection(LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00124                             "CellQualityCollection",
00125                             "Collection with quality flags",
00126                             _cellQualityColName,
00127                             std::string("AhcCellQuality"));
00128 
00129     /* steering file parameters to allow systematic studies
00130      */
00131     
00132     registerOptionalParameter( "MIPConstantScaleFactor",
00133                                "factor to scale all MIP constants",
00134                                _MIPConstantScaleFactor,
00135                                (float)1. );
00136 
00137     registerOptionalParameter( "MIPSlopeScaleFactor",
00138                                "factor to scale all MIP slopes",
00139                                _MIPSlopeScaleFactor,
00140                                (float)1. );
00141 
00142     registerOptionalParameter( "GainConstantScaleFactor",
00143                                "factor to scale all gain constants",
00144                                _gainConstantScaleFactor,
00145                                (float)1. );
00146 
00147     registerOptionalParameter( "GainSlopeScaleFactor",
00148                                "factor to scale all gain slopes",
00149                                _gainSlopeScaleFactor,
00150                                (float)1. );
00151 
00152     registerOptionalParameter( "InterCalibrationScaleFactor",
00153                                "factor to scale all inter-calibration constants",
00154                                _interCalibrationScaleFactor,
00155                                (float)1. );
00156 
00157     registerOptionalParameter( "PhysicsCalibICScaleFactor",
00158                                "factor to scale all inter-calibration physics/calib constants",
00159                                _PhysicsCalibICScaleFactor,
00160                                (float)1. );
00161     
00162     _container = NULL;
00163 
00164     _pedestalCol                 = NULL;
00165     _MIPConstantCol              = NULL;
00166     _MIPSlopeCol                 = NULL;
00167     _gainConstantCol             = NULL;
00168     _gainSlopeCol                = NULL;
00169     _interCalibrationCol         = NULL;
00170     _PhysicsCalibICCol           = NULL;
00171     //_temperatureCol              = NULL;
00172     _saturationParametersCol     = NULL;
00173     _timeSlopesParametersCol     = NULL;
00174     _timePedestalParametersCol   = NULL;
00175     _cellQualityCol              = NULL;
00176   }

00182   Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::~Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor()
00183   {
00184     if (_container) delete _container;
00185     _Ahc2CalibrationsContainerMap.erase(Processor::name());
00186   }

00189   /*                                                                                     */
00190   /*                                                                                     */
00191   /*                                                                                     */
00192   /***************************************************************************************/
00193   void Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::init()
00194   {
00195     std::cout << "Start init" << std::endl;
00196 
00197     printParameters();
00198 
00199     _pedestalChanged                 = false;
00200     _MIPConstantChanged              = false;
00201     _MIPSlopeChanged                 = false;
00202     _gainConstantChanged             = false;
00203     _gainSlopeChanged                = false;
00204     _interCalibrationChanged         = false;
00205     _PhysicsCalibICChanged           = false;
00206 
00207     _temperatureChanged              = false;
00208     _saturationParametersChanged     = false;
00209     _timeSlopesParametersChanged     = false;
00210     _timePedestalParametersChanged   = false;
00211 
00212     _cellQualityChanged              = false;
00213 
00214     _MIPSlopeScaled                  = parameterSet("MIPSlopeScaleFactor");
00215     _MIPConstantScaled               = parameterSet("MIPConstantScaleFactor");
00216     _gainSlopeScaled                 = parameterSet("GainSlopeScaleFactor");
00217     _gainConstantScaled              = parameterSet("GainConstantScaleFactor");
00218     _interCalibrationScaled          = parameterSet("InterCalibrationScaleFactor");
00219     _PhysicsCalibICScaled            = parameterSet("PhysicsCalibICScaleFactor");
00220 
00221     std::stringstream message;
00222     bool error = false;
00223 
00224     _mapper = MappingProcessor::getMapper(_mappingProcessorName);
00225 
00226     std::cout << "getMapper done" << std::endl;
00227 
00228     const std::string CellIDEncoding = _mapper->getDecoder()->getCellIDEncoding();
00229     const std::string ModuleEncoding = _mapper->getDecoder()->getModuleEncoding();
00230 
00231     std::cout << "CellIDEncoding " << CellIDEncoding << std::endl;
00232     std::cout << "ModuleEncoding " << ModuleEncoding << std::endl;
00233 
00234     if ( ! _mapper )
00235       {
00236         message << "MappingProcessor::getMapper("<< _mappingProcessorName << ") did not return a valid mapper." << std::endl;
00237         error = true;
00238       }
00239     
00240     /* registration of the conditions change listeners has to go here
00241      *
00242      * should not break immediately but append report to message and set error to true,
00243      * if registration not possible
00244      *
00245      */
00246     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _pedestalColName))
00247       {
00248         message << " undefined conditions: " << _pedestalColName << std::endl;
00249         error = true;
00250       }
00251 
00252     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _MIPConstantColName))
00253       {
00254         message << " undefined conditions: " << _MIPConstantColName << std::endl;
00255         error = true;
00256       }
00257     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _MIPSlopeColName))
00258       {
00259         message << " undefined conditions: " << _MIPSlopeColName << std::endl;
00260         error = true;
00261       }
00262     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _gainConstantColName))
00263       {
00264         message << " undefined conditions: " << _gainConstantColName << std::endl;
00265         error = true;
00266       }
00267     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _gainSlopeColName))
00268       {
00269         message << " undefined conditions: " << _gainSlopeColName << std::endl;
00270         error = true;
00271       }
00272     
00273     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _interCalibrationColName))
00274       {
00275         message << " undefined conditions: " << _interCalibrationColName << std::endl;
00276         error = true;
00277       }
00278 
00279     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _PhysicsCalibICColName))
00280       {
00281         message << " undefined conditions: " << _PhysicsCalibICColName << std::endl;
00282         error = true;
00283       }
00284     
00285     /*
00286       if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _temperatureColName))
00287       {
00288       message << " undefined conditions: " << _temperatureColName << std::endl;
00289       error = true;
00290       }
00291     */
00292 
00293     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _saturationParametersColName))
00294       {
00295         message << " undefined conditions: " << _saturationParametersColName << std::endl;
00296         error = true;
00297       }
00298 
00299     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _timeSlopesParametersColName))
00300       {
00301         message << " undefined conditions: " << _timeSlopesParametersColName << std::endl;
00302         error = true;
00303       }
00304 
00305     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _timePedestalParametersColName))
00306       {
00307         message << " undefined conditions: " << _timePedestalParametersColName << std::endl;
00308         error = true;
00309       }
00310 
00311     
00312     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _cellQualityColName))
00313       {
00314         message << " undefined conditions: " << _cellQualityColName << std::endl;
00315         error = true;
00316       }
00317       
00318     
00319     if (error) {
00320       streamlog_out(ERROR) << message.str();
00321       throw marlin::StopProcessingException(this);
00322     }
00323 
00324     _mapperVersion = _mapper->getVersion();
00325 
00326     _container = new MappedContainer<Ahc2Calibrations>(_mapper);
00327     _Ahc2CalibrationsContainerMap[Processor::name()] = _container;
00328 
00329     std::cout << "End of init" << std::endl;
00330 
00331   }
00332 
00333   /***************************************************************************************/
00334   /* function to listen for condition changes in LCCD                                    */
00335   /*                                                                                     */
00336   /* should only remember pointer of collection and set flag for the changed conditions; */
00337   /* processing should wait till process event. this ensures that constants that depend  */
00338   /* on two different conditions collections have both collections available             */
00339   /*                                                                                     */
00340   /* the callbacks from LCCD have no guarantied order                                    */
00341   /*                                                                                     */
00342   /***************************************************************************************/
00343   void Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::conditionsChanged( LCCollection * col ) {
00344 
00345     std::cout << "ConditionsChanged" << std::endl;
00346 
00347     std::string colName = col->getParameters().getStringVal("CollectionName") ;
00348 
00349     if (colName == _MIPConstantColName)
00350       {
00351         _MIPConstantCol = col;
00352         _MIPConstantChanged = true;
00353       }
00354     else if (colName == _MIPSlopeColName)
00355       {
00356         _MIPSlopeCol = col;
00357         _MIPSlopeChanged = true;
00358       }
00359     else if (colName == _gainConstantColName)
00360       {
00361         _gainConstantCol = col;
00362         _gainConstantChanged = true;
00363       }
00364     else if (colName == _gainSlopeColName)
00365       {
00366         _gainSlopeCol = col;
00367         _gainSlopeChanged = true;
00368       }
00369     
00370     else if (colName == _interCalibrationColName)
00371       {
00372         _interCalibrationCol = col;
00373         _interCalibrationChanged = true;
00374       }
00375 
00376     else if (colName == _PhysicsCalibICColName)
00377       {
00378         _PhysicsCalibICCol = col;
00379         _PhysicsCalibICChanged = true;
00380       }
00381     
00382     else if (colName == _pedestalColName)
00383       {
00384         _pedestalCol = col;
00385         _pedestalChanged = true;
00386       }
00387     else if (colName == _temperatureColName)
00388       {
00389         _temperatureCol = col;
00390         _temperatureChanged = true;
00391       }
00392     else if (colName == _saturationParametersColName)
00393       {
00394         _saturationParametersCol = col;
00395         _saturationParametersChanged = true;
00396       }
00397     else if (colName == _timeSlopesParametersColName)
00398       {
00399         _timeSlopesParametersCol = col;
00400         _timeSlopesParametersChanged = true;
00401       }
00402     else if (colName == _timePedestalParametersColName)
00403       {
00404         _timePedestalParametersCol = col;
00405         _timePedestalParametersChanged = true;
00406       }
00407 
00408     else if (colName == _cellQualityColName)
00409       {
00410         _cellQualityCol = col;
00411         _cellQualityChanged = true;
00412       }
00413 
00414     else {
00415       const std::list<lccd::IConditionsHandler*> theList = this->handlerList();
00416       std::cout<<"AAA "<<theList.size()<<std::endl;
00417 
00418       for(std::list<lccd::IConditionsHandler*>::const_iterator it=theList.begin();it != theList.end();++it){
00419         std::cout << "AAA handler:" << (*it)->name() << std::endl;
00420         if( col == (*it)->defaultCollection()){
00421           std::cout << "using default collection" << std::endl;
00422         }
00423       }
00424 
00425       streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Called as conditions listener for collection " << colName << ", but not responsible." << std::endl;
00426       throw StopProcessingException(this);
00427     }
00428   }
00429 
00430   /***************************************************************************************/
00431   /*                                                                                     */
00432   /*                                                                                     */
00433   /* functions to do the actual update (or initialisation) of the calibrations           */
00434   /*                                                                                     */
00435   /*                                                                                     */
00436   /***************************************************************************************/
00437   void Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::updateMIPCalibration()
00438   {
00439     std::cout << "updateMIPCalibration" << std::endl;
00440 
00441     if (!_MIPSlopeCol)
00442       {
00443         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update MIP, MIP slope collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00444         throw StopProcessingException(this);
00445       }
00446 
00447     if (!_MIPConstantCol )
00448       {
00449         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update MIP, MIP constant collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00450         throw StopProcessingException(this);
00451       }
00452 
00453     float defaultMIPConstant      = _MIPConstantCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultValue");
00454     float defaultMIPConstantError = _MIPConstantCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultError");
00455 
00456     float defaultMIPConstantReferencePoint      = _MIPConstantCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultReferencePoint");
00457     float defaultMIPConstantReferencePointError = _MIPConstantCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultReferencePointError");
00458 
00459 
00460     float defaultMIPSlope      = _MIPSlopeCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultValue");
00461     float defaultMIPSlopeError = _MIPSlopeCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultError");
00462 
00463     MappedContainer<LinearFitSlope>    *slopes    = new MappedContainer<LinearFitSlope>(_mapper);
00464     MappedContainer<LinearFitConstant> *constants = new MappedContainer<LinearFitConstant>(_mapper);
00465 
00466     for (int i = 0; i < _MIPSlopeCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00467       {
00468         LinearFitSlope *slope = new LinearFitSlope( _MIPSlopeCol->getElementAt(i) );
00469 
00470         try
00471           {
00472             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "fill MIP slopes by ModuleID : index " << i << " ID " << slope->getID() << " slope " << slope << std::endl;
00473             slopes->fillByModuleID(slope->getID(),slope);
00474           }
00475         catch(BadDataException& e)
00476           {
00477             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " updateMIPCalibration(): invalid module id " << slope->getID()
00478                          <<", maybe incomplete installation "<<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
00479           }
00480       }
00481 
00482     for (int i = 0; i < _MIPConstantCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00483       {
00484         LinearFitConstant *constant = new LinearFitConstant( _MIPConstantCol->getElementAt(i) );
00485         try
00486           {
00487             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "fill MIP constants by ModuleID : index " << i << " ID " << constant->getID() << " constant " << constant << std::endl;
00488             CALICE::HcalTileIndex hti( constant->getID() );
00489             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << hti << '\n'
00490                          << *constant << std::endl;
00491             constants->fillByModuleID(constant->getID(),constant);
00492           }
00493         catch(BadDataException& e)
00494           {
00495             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " updateMIPCalibration(): invalid module id " << constant->getID()
00496                          <<", maybe incomplete installation "<<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
00497           }
00498       }
00499 
00500     streamlog_out(MESSAGE)<<"   ===== checking  mip  ====" << std::endl;
00501 
00502     for ( std::vector<Ahc2Calibrations*>::iterator iter = _allCalibrations.begin(); iter != _allCalibrations.end(); ++iter)
00503       {
00504         // remove old MIP calibration
00505         if ( (*iter)->getMIP() ) delete (*iter)->getMIP();
00506 
00507         int ID = (*iter)->getCellID();
00508         Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits bits = Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits( (*iter)->getStatus() );
00509 
00510         LinearFitSlope *slope = slopes->getByCellID(ID);
00511         LinearFitConstant *constant = constants->getByCellID(ID);
00512 
00513         LinearFitCompound *mip = 0;
00514 
00515         bits.setMIPConstantDefault(false);
00516         bits.setMIPSlopeDefault(false);
00517         if ( constant && slope )
00518           {
00519             mip = new LinearFitCompound(constant, slope);
00520           }
00521         else if ( constant && !slope )
00522           {         
00523             mip = new LinearFitCompound(ID,
00524                                         constant->getConstant(),
00525                                         constant->getConstantError(),
00526                                         constant->getConstantReferencePoint(),
00527                                         constant->getConstantReferencePointError(),
00528                                         defaultMIPSlope,
00529                                         defaultMIPSlopeError
00530                                         );
00531             bits.setMIPSlopeDefault();
00532           }
00533         else if ( !constant && slope )
00534           {
00535             mip = new LinearFitCompound(ID,
00536                                         defaultMIPConstant,
00537                                         defaultMIPConstantError,
00538                                         defaultMIPConstantReferencePoint,
00539                                         defaultMIPConstantReferencePointError,
00540                                         slope->getSlope(),
00541                                         slope->getSlopeError()
00542                                         );
00543             bits.setMIPConstantDefault();
00544           }
00545         else
00546           {
00547             mip = new LinearFitCompound(ID,
00548                                         defaultMIPConstant,
00549                                         defaultMIPConstantError,
00550                                         defaultMIPConstantReferencePoint,
00551                                         defaultMIPConstantReferencePointError,
00552                                         defaultMIPSlope,
00553                                         defaultMIPSlopeError
00554                                         );
00555             bits.setMIPConstantDefault();
00556             bits.setMIPSlopeDefault();
00557           }
00558 
00559         if (_MIPConstantScaled) {
00560           mip->setConstant( mip->getConstant() * _MIPConstantScaleFactor );
00561           mip->setConstantError( mip->getConstantError() * _MIPConstantScaleFactor );
00562           bits.setMIPConstantScaled();
00563         }
00564         else {
00565           bits.setMIPConstantScaled(false);
00566         }
00567 
00568         if (_MIPSlopeScaled) {
00569           mip->setSlope( mip->getSlope() * _MIPSlopeScaleFactor );
00570           mip->setSlopeError( mip->getSlopeError() * _MIPSlopeScaleFactor );
00571           bits.setMIPSlopeScaled();
00572         }
00573         else {
00574           bits.setMIPSlopeScaled(false);
00575         }
00576 
00577         (*iter)->setMIP(mip);
00578         (*iter)->setStatus(bits.getInt());
00579 
00580         //TODO: change to DEBUG
00581         streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"ID: " <<ID 
00582                       <<"  Cell" << *mip << std::endl;
00583 
00584 
00585       }/*------------- end iteration over Ahc2Calibrations --------------------*/
00586 
00587     _MIPConstantChanged = false;
00588     _MIPSlopeChanged    = false;
00589 
00590     delete slopes;
00591     delete constants;
00592 
00593 
00594     std::cout << "end of updateMIPcalibration" << std::endl;
00595   }
00596 
00597   /***************************************************************************************/
00598   /*                                                                                     */
00599   /*                                                                                     */
00600   /*                                                                                     */
00601   /***************************************************************************************/
00602   void Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::updateGainCalibration()
00603   {
00604     std::cout << "updateGaincalibration" << std::endl;
00605 
00606     if (!_gainSlopeCol)
00607       {
00608         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update gain, gain slope collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00609         throw StopProcessingException(this);
00610       }
00611 
00612     if (!_gainConstantCol )
00613       {
00614         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update gain, gain constant collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00615         throw StopProcessingException(this);
00616       }
00617 
00618     float defaultGainConstant      = _gainConstantCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultValue");
00619     float defaultGainConstantError = _gainConstantCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultError");
00620 
00621     float defaultGainConstantReferencePoint      = _gainConstantCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultReferencePoint");
00622     float defaultGainConstantReferencePointError = _gainConstantCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultReferencePointError");
00623 
00624     float defaultGainSlope      = _gainSlopeCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultValue");
00625     float defaultGainSlopeError = _gainSlopeCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultError");
00626 
00627     MappedContainer<LinearFitSlope>    *slopes    = new MappedContainer<LinearFitSlope>(_mapper);
00628     MappedContainer<LinearFitConstant> *constants = new MappedContainer<LinearFitConstant>(_mapper);
00629 
00630     for (int i = 0; i < _gainSlopeCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00631       {
00632         LinearFitSlope *slope = new LinearFitSlope( _gainSlopeCol->getElementAt(i) );
00633         try
00634           {
00635 
00636             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "fill gain slopes by ModuleID : index " << i << " ID " << slope->getID() << " slope " << slope << std::endl;
00637             slopes->fillByModuleID(slope->getID(),slope);
00638           }
00639         catch(BadDataException& e)
00640           {
00641             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " updateGainCalibration(): invalid module id " << slope->getID()
00642                          <<", maybe incomplete installation "<<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
00643           }
00644       }
00645 
00646     for (int i = 0; i < _gainConstantCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00647       {
00648         LinearFitConstant *constant = new LinearFitConstant( _gainConstantCol->getElementAt(i) );
00649 
00650         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "fill gain constants by ModuleID : index " << i << " ID " << constant->getID() << " constant " << constant << std::endl;
00651         CALICE::HcalTileIndex hti( constant->getID() );
00652         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << hti << '\n'
00653                      << *constant << std::endl;
00654 
00655         constants->fillByModuleID(constant->getID(), constant);
00656       }
00657 
00658 
00659     std::cout << "done filling" << std::endl;
00660 
00661     //TODO: change to DEBUG
00662     streamlog_out(MESSAGE)<<"   ===== checking  gain  ====" << std::endl;
00663 
00664     for ( std::vector<Ahc2Calibrations*>::iterator iter = _allCalibrations.begin(); iter != _allCalibrations.end(); ++iter)
00665       {
00666         /* remove old gain calibration*/
00667         if ( (*iter)->getGain() ) delete (*iter)->getGain();
00668 
00669         int ID = (*iter)->getCellID();
00670         Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits bits = Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits( (*iter)->getStatus() );
00671 
00672         LinearFitSlope *slope = slopes->getByCellID(ID);
00673         LinearFitConstant *constant = constants->getByCellID(ID);
00674 
00675         LinearFitCompound *gain = 0;
00676 
00677         bits.setGainConstantDefault(false);
00678         bits.setGainSlopeDefault(false);
00679         if ( constant && slope )
00680           {
00681             gain = new LinearFitCompound(constant, slope);
00682           }
00683         else if ( constant && !slope )
00684           {
00685             gain = new LinearFitCompound(ID,
00686                                          constant->getConstant(),
00687                                          constant->getConstantError(),
00688                                          constant->getConstantReferencePoint(),
00689                                          constant->getConstantReferencePointError(),
00690                                          defaultGainSlope,
00691                                          defaultGainSlopeError
00692                                          );
00693             bits.setGainSlopeDefault();
00694           }
00695         else if ( !constant && slope )
00696           {
00697             gain = new LinearFitCompound(ID,
00698                                          defaultGainConstant,
00699                                          defaultGainConstantError,
00700                                          defaultGainConstantReferencePoint,
00701                                          defaultGainConstantReferencePointError,
00702                                          slope->getSlope(),
00703                                          slope->getSlopeError()
00704                                          );
00705             bits.setGainConstantDefault();
00706           }
00707         else
00708           {
00709             gain = new LinearFitCompound(ID,
00710                                          defaultGainConstant,
00711                                          defaultGainConstantError,
00712                                          defaultGainConstantReferencePoint,
00713                                          defaultGainConstantReferencePointError,
00714                                          defaultGainSlope,
00715                                          defaultGainSlopeError
00716                                          );
00717             bits.setGainConstantDefault();
00718             bits.setGainSlopeDefault();
00719           }
00720 
00721 
00722         if (_gainConstantScaled) {
00723           gain->setConstant( gain->getConstant() * _gainConstantScaleFactor );
00724           gain->setConstantError( gain->getConstantError() * _gainConstantScaleFactor );
00725           bits.setGainConstantScaled();
00726         }
00727         else {
00728           bits.setGainConstantScaled(false);
00729         }
00730 
00731         if (_gainSlopeScaled) {
00732           gain->setSlope( gain->getSlope() * _gainSlopeScaleFactor );
00733           gain->setSlopeError( gain->getSlopeError() * _gainSlopeScaleFactor );
00734           bits.setGainSlopeScaled();
00735         }
00736         else {
00737           bits.setGainSlopeScaled(false);
00738         }
00739 
00740         (*iter)->setStatus(bits.getInt());
00741         (*iter)->setGain(gain);
00742 
00743         //TODO: change to DEBUG
00744         streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"ID: " <<ID 
00745                       <<"  Cell" << *gain << std::endl;
00746 
00747       }/*------------- end iteration over Ahc2Calibrations --------------------*/
00748 
00749     _gainConstantChanged = false;
00750     _gainSlopeChanged    = false;
00751 
00752     delete slopes;
00753     delete constants;
00754 
00755     std::cout << "end of updateGaincalibration" << std::endl;
00756   }
00757   /***************************************************************************************/
00758   /*                                                                                     */
00759   /*                                                                                     */
00760   /*                                                                                     */
00761   /***************************************************************************************/
00762   void Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::updatePedestal()
00763   {
00764     
00765     streamlog_out(MESSAGE)<<" start  updatePedestal now! "<<std::endl;
00766 
00767     if (!_pedestalCol)
00768       {
00769         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update pedestal, pedestal collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00770         throw StopProcessingException(this);
00771       }
00772 
00773     MappedContainer<SimpleValue> *pedestalContainer = new MappedContainer<SimpleValue>(_mapper);
00774 
00775     streamlog_out(MESSAGE)<<" NumberOfElements(): "<<  _pedestalCol->getNumberOfElements() <<std::endl;
00776 
00777     for (int i = 0; i < _pedestalCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00778       {
00779 
00780         SimpleValue *pedestalVal = new SimpleValue(_pedestalCol->getElementAt(i));
00781 
00782         try
00783           {
00784             //std::cout << "Fill pedestal cellID " << pedestalVal->getCellID() 
00785             //        << " pedestal value " << pedestalVal->getValue() << " error " << pedestalVal->getError() << std::endl;
00786 
00787             pedestalContainer->fillByModuleID(pedestalVal->getCellID(), pedestalVal);
00788             //pedestalContainer->fillByCellID(pedestalVal->getCellID(), pedestalVal);
00789           }
00790 
00791         catch(BadDataException& e)
00792           {
00793             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " updatePedestal(): invalid module id " << pedestalVal->getCellID()
00794                          <<", maybe incomplete installation "<<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
00795           }
00796       }
00797 
00798 
00799     for ( std::vector<Ahc2Calibrations*>::iterator iter = _allCalibrations.begin(); iter != _allCalibrations.end(); ++iter)
00800       {
00801         
00802         // delete old pedestal values   
00803         if ( (*iter)->getPedestal() ) delete (*iter)->getPedestal();
00804 
00805         int ID = (*iter)->getCellID();
00806         Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits bits = Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits( (*iter)->getStatus() );
00807 
00808         //std::cout << "From pedestalContainer stock the info cellID " << ID << std::endl;
00809 
00810         SimpleValue *pedestal = pedestalContainer->removeByCellID(ID);
00811 
00812         if (pedestal == NULL)
00813           {
00814             float value = 0.;
00815             float error = 0.;
00816             int status = 1;
00817 
00818             //To do : pedestal = new SimpleValue(ID, nMemo, value, error, status);
00819             pedestal = new SimpleValue(ID, value, error, status);
00820             bits.setNoPedestal();
00821             
00822           }
00823 
00824         (*iter)->setStatus(bits.getInt());
00825         (*iter)->setPedestal(pedestal);
00826 
00827         //TODO: change to DEBUG
00828         
00829         streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<" ID: " << ID 
00830                       <<" CellID: " << pedestal->getCellID() << " ";
00831 
00832         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "value "  << pedestal->getValue() << " "
00833                        << "error "  << pedestal->getError() << " "
00834                        << "status " << pedestal->getStatus()<< " ";
00835 
00836         streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<" "<< std::endl;
00837         
00838 
00839         streamlog_out(MESSAGE)<<" updatePedestal done! "<<std::endl;
00840 
00841       }
00842 
00843 
00844     _pedestalChanged = false;
00845 
00846     delete pedestalContainer;
00847 
00848   }
00849 
00850 
00851 
00852   /***************************************************************************************/
00853   /*                                                                                     */
00854   /*                                                                                     */
00855   /*                                                                                     */
00856   /***************************************************************************************/
00857   void Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::updateTemperature()
00858   {
00859     std::cout << "update Temperature" << std::endl;
00860 
00861     if (!_temperatureCol)
00862       {
00863         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update temperature, temperature collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00864         throw StopProcessingException(this);
00865       }
00866 
00867     MappedContainer<SimpleValue> *temperatureContainer = new MappedContainer<SimpleValue>(_mapper);
00868     for (int i = 0; i < _temperatureCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00869       {
00870         SimpleValue *temperatureVal = new SimpleValue(_temperatureCol->getElementAt(i));
00871         try
00872           {
00873             //temperatureContainer->fillByCellID(temperatureVal->getCellID(), temperatureVal);
00874             temperatureContainer->fillByModuleID(temperatureVal->getCellID(), temperatureVal);
00875           }
00876 
00877         catch(BadDataException& e)
00878           {
00879             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " updateTemperature(): invalid module id " << temperatureVal->getCellID()
00880                          <<", maybe incomplete installation "<<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
00881           }
00882       }
00883 
00884     for ( std::vector<Ahc2Calibrations*>::iterator iter = _allCalibrations.begin(); iter != _allCalibrations.end(); ++iter)
00885       {
00886         /*delete old pedestal values*/
00887         if ( (*iter)->getTemperature() ) delete (*iter)->getTemperature();
00888 
00889         int ID = (*iter)->getCellID();
00890         Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits bits = Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits( (*iter)->getStatus() );
00891 
00892         /*
00893           just to be safe, create a temporary simple value
00894           (we delete the container in the end, and the SimpleValue does not
00895           belong to us)
00896         */
00897         SimpleValue *temperatureTemp = temperatureContainer->getByCellID(ID);
00898         SimpleValue *temperature = NULL;
00899         if (temperatureTemp == NULL)
00900           {
00901             temperature = new SimpleValue(ID,
00902                                           0., /*value*/
00903                                           0., /*error*/
00904                                           1   /*status*/
00905                                           );
00906             bits.setNoTemperature();
00907           }
00908         else
00909           {
00910             temperature = new SimpleValue(temperatureTemp->getCellID(),
00911                                           temperatureTemp->getValue(),
00912                                           temperatureTemp->getError(),
00913                                           temperatureTemp->getStatus());
00914             bits.setNoTemperature(false);
00915           }
00916         
00917         (*iter)->setStatus(bits.getInt());
00918         (*iter)->setTemperature(temperature);
00919       }
00920 
00921     _temperatureChanged = false;
00922 
00923     delete temperatureContainer;
00924 
00925     std::cout << "end update Temperature" << std::endl;
00926 
00927   }
00928 
00929   /***************************************************************************************/
00930   /*                                                                                     */
00931   /*                                                                                     */
00932   /*                                                                                     */
00933   /***************************************************************************************/
00934   void Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::updateInterCalibration()
00935   {
00936     std::cout << "update Intercalibration" << std::endl;
00937 
00938     if (!_interCalibrationCol)
00939       {
00940         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update inter-calibration, collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00941         throw StopProcessingException(this);
00942       }
00943 
00944     float defaultInterCalibration      = _interCalibrationCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultValue");
00945     float defaultInterCalibrationError = _interCalibrationCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultError");
00946 
00947     MappedContainer<SimpleValue> *interCalibContainer = new MappedContainer<SimpleValue>(_mapper);
00948 
00949     for (int i = 0; i < _interCalibrationCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00950       {
00951         LinearFitConstant interCalib(_interCalibrationCol->getElementAt(i));
00952         SimpleValue *interCalibValue = new SimpleValue(interCalib.getID(),
00953                                                        interCalib.getConstant(),
00954                                                        interCalib.getConstantError(),
00955                                                        1);//status
00956         try
00957           {
00958             interCalibContainer->fillByModuleID(interCalibValue->getCellID(), interCalibValue);
00959           }
00960         catch(BadDataException& e)
00961           {
00962             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " updateInterCalibration(): invalid module id " << interCalibValue->getCellID()
00963                          <<", maybe incomplete installation "<<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
00964           }
00965       }
00966 
00967     for ( std::vector<Ahc2Calibrations*>::iterator iter = _allCalibrations.begin(); iter != _allCalibrations.end(); ++iter)
00968       {
00969         // delete old inter-calibration values
00970         if ( (*iter)->getInterCalibration() ) delete (*iter)->getInterCalibration();
00971 
00972         int ID = (*iter)->getCellID();
00973         Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits bits = Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits( (*iter)->getStatus() );
00974 
00975         /*
00976           just to be safe, create a temporary simple value
00977           (we delete the container in the end, and the SimpleValue does not
00978           belong to us)
00979         */
00980         SimpleValue *interCalibrationTemp = interCalibContainer->removeByCellID(ID);
00981         SimpleValue *interCalibration = NULL;
00982 
00983         if (interCalibrationTemp == NULL)
00984           {
00985             interCalibration = new SimpleValue(ID,
00986                                                defaultInterCalibration,
00987                                                defaultInterCalibrationError,
00988                                                1   //status
00989                                                );
00990             bits.setInterCalibrationDefault();
00991           }
00992         else
00993           {
00994             interCalibration = new SimpleValue(interCalibrationTemp->getCellID(),
00995                                                interCalibrationTemp->getValue(),
00996                                                interCalibrationTemp->getError(),
00997                                                interCalibrationTemp->getStatus());
00998             bits.setInterCalibrationDefault(false);
00999           }
01000 
01001         if (_interCalibrationScaled) {
01002           interCalibration->setValue( interCalibration->getValue() * _interCalibrationScaleFactor );
01003           interCalibration->setError( interCalibration->getError() * _interCalibrationScaleFactor );
01004           bits.setInterCalibrationScaled();
01005         }
01006         else {
01007           bits.setInterCalibrationScaled(false);
01008         }
01009 
01010         (*iter)->setStatus(bits.getInt());
01011         (*iter)->setInterCalibration(interCalibration);
01012       }
01013 
01014     _interCalibrationChanged = false;
01015 
01016     delete interCalibContainer;
01017 
01018     std::cout << "end update Intercalibration" << std::endl;
01019   }
01020 
01021   /***************************************************************************************/
01022   /*                                                                                     */
01023   /*                                                                                     */
01024   /*                                                                                     */
01025   /***************************************************************************************/
01026   void Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::updatePhysicsCalibIC()
01027   {
01028     std::cout << "update PhysicsCalibIC" << std::endl;
01029 
01030     if (!_PhysicsCalibICCol)
01031       {
01032         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update inter-calibration physics calib, collection is not valid." << std::endl;
01033         throw StopProcessingException(this);
01034       }
01035 
01036     float defaultPhysicsCalibIC      = _PhysicsCalibICCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultValue");
01037     float defaultPhysicsCalibICError = _PhysicsCalibICCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultError");
01038 
01039     MappedContainer<SimpleValue> *PhysicsCalibICContainer = new MappedContainer<SimpleValue>(_mapper);
01040 
01041     for (int i = 0; i < _PhysicsCalibICCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
01042       {
01043         LinearFitConstant PhysicsCalibIC(_PhysicsCalibICCol->getElementAt(i));
01044         SimpleValue *PhysicsCalibICValue = new SimpleValue(PhysicsCalibIC.getID(),
01045                                                        PhysicsCalibIC.getConstant(),
01046                                                        PhysicsCalibIC.getConstantError(),
01047                                                        1);//status
01048         try
01049           {
01050             PhysicsCalibICContainer->fillByModuleID(PhysicsCalibICValue->getCellID(), PhysicsCalibICValue);
01051           }
01052         catch(BadDataException& e)
01053           {
01054             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " updatePhysicsCalibIC(): invalid module id " << PhysicsCalibICValue->getCellID()
01055                                  <<", maybe incomplete installation "<<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
01056           }
01057       }
01058 
01059     for ( std::vector<Ahc2Calibrations*>::iterator iter = _allCalibrations.begin(); iter != _allCalibrations.end(); ++iter)
01060       {
01061         // delete old inter-calibration values
01062         if ( (*iter)->getPhysicsCalibIC() ) delete (*iter)->getPhysicsCalibIC();
01063 
01064         int ID = (*iter)->getCellID();
01065         Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits bits = Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits( (*iter)->getStatus() );
01066 
01067         /*
01068           just to be safe, create a temporary simple value
01069           (we delete the container in the end, and the SimpleValue does not
01070           belong to us)
01071         */
01072         SimpleValue *PhysicsCalibICTemp = PhysicsCalibICContainer->removeByCellID(ID);
01073         SimpleValue *PhysicsCalibIC = NULL;
01074 
01075         if (PhysicsCalibICTemp == NULL)
01076           {
01077             PhysicsCalibIC = new SimpleValue(ID,
01078                                                defaultPhysicsCalibIC ,
01079                                                defaultPhysicsCalibICError,
01080                                                1   //status
01081                                                );
01082             bits.setPhysicsCalibICDefault();
01083           }
01084         else
01085           {
01086             PhysicsCalibIC = new SimpleValue(PhysicsCalibICTemp->getCellID(),
01087                                                PhysicsCalibICTemp->getValue(),
01088                                                PhysicsCalibICTemp->getError(),
01089                                                PhysicsCalibICTemp->getStatus());
01090             bits.setPhysicsCalibICDefault(false);
01091           }
01092 
01093         if (_PhysicsCalibICScaled) {
01094           PhysicsCalibIC->setValue( PhysicsCalibIC->getValue() * _PhysicsCalibICScaleFactor );
01095           PhysicsCalibIC->setError( PhysicsCalibIC->getError() * _PhysicsCalibICScaleFactor );
01096           bits.setPhysicsCalibICScaled();
01097         }
01098         else {
01099           bits.setPhysicsCalibICScaled(false);
01100         }
01101 
01102         (*iter)->setStatus(bits.getInt());
01103         (*iter)->setPhysicsCalibIC(PhysicsCalibIC);
01104       }
01105 
01106     _PhysicsCalibICChanged = false;
01107 
01108     delete PhysicsCalibICContainer;
01109 
01110     std::cout << "end updatePhysicsCalibIC" << std::endl;
01111   }
01112 
01113   /***************************************************************************************/
01114   /*                                                                                     */
01115   /*                                                                                     */
01116   /*                                                                                     */
01117   /***************************************************************************************/
01118   void Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::updateSaturationParameters()
01119   {
01120     std::cout << "update Saturation Parameters" << std::endl;
01121 
01122     if (!_saturationParametersCol)
01123       {
01124         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update saturation, collection is not valid." << std::endl;
01125         throw StopProcessingException(this);
01126       }
01127 
01128     MappedContainer<SaturationParameters> *saturationParametersContainer = new MappedContainer<SaturationParameters>(_mapper);
01129     for (int i = 0; i < _saturationParametersCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
01130       {
01131         SaturationParameters *saturationParam = new SaturationParameters(_saturationParametersCol->getElementAt(i)); // this will make a copy of the data (not link against the data like SimpleValue)
01132         
01133         try
01134           {
01135             saturationParametersContainer->fillByModuleID(saturationParam->getCellID(), saturationParam);
01136           }
01137 
01138         catch(BadDataException& e)
01139           {
01140             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " invalid module id " << saturationParam->getCellID() <<", maybe incomplete installation "
01141                          <<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
01142           }
01143       }
01144 
01145     for ( std::vector<Ahc2Calibrations*>::iterator iter = _allCalibrations.begin(); iter != _allCalibrations.end(); ++iter)
01146       {
01147         // delete old saturation
01148         if ( (*iter)->getSaturation() ) delete (*iter)->getSaturation();
01149 
01150         int ID = (*iter)->getCellID();
01151         Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits bits = Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits( (*iter)->getStatus() );
01152 
01153         // clear default bits
01154         bits.setSaturationParametersDefault(false);
01155 
01156         SaturationParameters *saturation = saturationParametersContainer->removeByCellID(ID); // we can savely use these, as data was copied and not linked
01157         
01158         if (saturation == NULL) // if there was nothing, generate a default scaling
01159           {
01160             int index = ID;
01161             const float Neffpx = 1600;
01162             float fraction = 1.;
01163             float epsilon = 1.;
01164 
01165             saturation = new SaturationParameters(index, Neffpx, fraction, epsilon);
01166             bits.setSaturationParametersDefault();
01167             bits.setisNewITEP(false);
01168           }
01169 
01170         if(saturation->getNpix() > 11000)//Check if tile is new ITEP
01171           bits.setisNewITEP(true);
01172 
01173         (*iter)->setStatus(bits.getInt());
01174         (*iter)->setSaturation(saturation);
01175 
01176         //TODO: change to DEBUG
01177         streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"ID: " <<ID 
01178                       <<"  CellID: " << saturation->getCellID()
01179                       <<" Neffpx: " << saturation->getNpix()
01180                               <<" fraction: " << saturation->getFraction()
01181                               <<" epsilon: " << saturation->getEpsilon()
01182                               << std::endl;
01183       }
01184 
01185     _saturationParametersChanged = false;
01186 
01187     delete saturationParametersContainer;
01188 
01189     std::cout << "end update Saturation Parameters" << std::endl;
01190   }
01191 
01192   /***************************************************************************************/
01193   /*                                                                                     */
01194   /*                                                                                     */
01195   /*                                                                                     */
01196   /***************************************************************************************/
01197 
01198   void Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::updateTimeSlopesParameters()
01199   {
01200     std::cout << "update Time Slopes Parameters" << std::endl;
01201 
01202     if (!_timeSlopesParametersCol)
01203       {
01204         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update time slopes, collection is not valid." << std::endl;
01205         throw StopProcessingException(this);
01206       }
01207 
01208     MappedContainer<SimpleValueVector> *timeSlopesParametersContainer = new MappedContainer<SimpleValueVector>(_mapper);
01209     for (int i = 0; i < _timeSlopesParametersCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
01210       {
01211         SimpleValueVector *timeSlopesParam = new SimpleValueVector(_timeSlopesParametersCol->getElementAt(i)); // this will make a copy of the data (not link against the data like SimpleValue)
01212         
01213         try
01214           {
01215             timeSlopesParametersContainer->fillByModuleID(timeSlopesParam->getCellID(), timeSlopesParam);
01216           }
01217 
01218         catch(BadDataException& e)
01219           {
01220             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " invalid module id " << timeSlopesParam->getCellID() <<", maybe incomplete installation "
01221                                  <<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
01222           }
01223       }
01224 
01225     for ( std::vector<Ahc2Calibrations*>::iterator iter = _allCalibrations.begin(); iter != _allCalibrations.end(); ++iter)
01226       {
01227         // delete old saturation
01228         if ( (*iter)->getTimeSlopes() ) delete (*iter)->getTimeSlopes();
01229 
01230         int ID = (*iter)->getCellID();
01231         Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits bits = Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits( (*iter)->getStatus() );
01232 
01233         // clear default bits
01234         bits.setTimeSlopesParametersDefault(false);
01235 
01236         SimpleValueVector *timeslope = timeSlopesParametersContainer->removeByCellID(ID); // we can savely use these, as data was copied and not linked
01237         
01238         if (timeslope == NULL) // if there was nothing, generate a default scaling
01239           {
01240             int index = ID;
01241             std::vector<float> slope;
01242             for(int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
01243               slope.push_back(1.6);
01244             std::vector<float> slope_err;
01245             for(int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
01246               slope_err.push_back(0.5);
01247             std::vector<int> status;
01248             for(int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
01249               status.push_back(1);
01250 
01251             timeslope = new SimpleValueVector(index, 2, slope, slope_err, status);
01252             bits.setTimeSlopesParametersDefault();
01253           }
01254 
01255         (*iter)->setStatus(bits.getInt());
01256         (*iter)->setTimeSlopes(timeslope);
01257 
01258         //TODO: change to DEBUG
01259         streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"ID: " <<ID 
01260                               <<"  CellID: " << timeslope->getCellID() << std::endl;
01261         
01262         for(int i = 0; i < timeslope->getSize(); i++)
01263           {
01264             streamlog_out(DEBUG) <<" slope: " << timeslope->getValue(i)
01265                       <<" slope_error: " << timeslope->getError(i)
01266                       <<" status: " << timeslope->getStatus(i);
01267           }
01268         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << std::endl;
01269       }
01270     
01271     _timeSlopesParametersChanged = false;
01272 
01273     delete timeSlopesParametersContainer;
01274 
01275     std::cout << "end update Time Slopes Parameters" << std::endl;
01276   }
01277 
01278   /***************************************************************************************/
01279   /*                                                                                     */
01280   /*                                                                                     */
01281   /*                                                                                     */
01282   /***************************************************************************************/
01283   
01284   void Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::updateTimePedestalParameters()
01285   {
01286     std::cout << "update Time Pedestal Parameters" << std::endl;
01287 
01288     if (!_timePedestalParametersCol)
01289       {
01290         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update time pedestal, collection is not valid." << std::endl;
01291         throw StopProcessingException(this);
01292       }
01293 
01294     MappedContainer<SimpleValueVector> *timePedestalParametersContainer = new MappedContainer<SimpleValueVector>(_mapper);
01295     for (int i = 0; i < _timePedestalParametersCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
01296       {
01297         SimpleValueVector *timePedestalParam = new SimpleValueVector(_timePedestalParametersCol->getElementAt(i)); // this will make a copy of the data (not link against the data like SimpleValue)
01298         
01299         try
01300           {
01301             timePedestalParametersContainer->fillByModuleID(timePedestalParam->getCellID(), timePedestalParam);
01302           }
01303 
01304         catch(BadDataException& e)
01305           {
01306             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " invalid module id " << timePedestalParam->getCellID() <<", maybe incomplete installation "
01307                                  <<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
01308           }
01309       }
01310 
01311     for ( std::vector<Ahc2Calibrations*>::iterator iter = _allCalibrations.begin(); iter != _allCalibrations.end(); ++iter)
01312       {
01313         // delete old saturation
01314         if ( (*iter)->getTimePedestal() ) delete (*iter)->getTimePedestal();
01315 
01316         int ID = (*iter)->getCellID();
01317         Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits bits = Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits( (*iter)->getStatus() );
01318 
01319         // clear default bits
01320         bits.setTimePedestalParametersDefault(false);
01321 
01322         SimpleValueVector *timepedestal = timePedestalParametersContainer->removeByCellID(ID); // we can savely use these, as data was copied and not linked
01323         
01324         if (timepedestal == NULL) // if there was nothing, generate a default scaling
01325           {
01326             int index = ID;
01327             std::vector<float> pedestal;
01328             for(int i = 0; i < 16; i++)
01329               pedestal.push_back(1000.);
01330             std::vector<float> pedestal_err;
01331             for(int i = 0; i < 16; i++)
01332               pedestal_err.push_back(5.5);
01333             std::vector<int> status;
01334             for(int i = 0; i < 16; i++)
01335               status.push_back(1);
01336 
01337             timepedestal = new SimpleValueVector(index, 16, pedestal, pedestal_err, status);
01338             bits.setTimePedestalParametersDefault();
01339           }
01340 
01341         (*iter)->setStatus(bits.getInt());
01342         (*iter)->setTimePedestal(timepedestal);
01343 
01344         //TODO: change to DEBUG
01345         streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"ID: " <<ID 
01346                               <<"  CellID: " << timepedestal->getCellID() << std::endl;
01347         for(int i = 0; i < timepedestal->getSize(); i++)
01348           {
01349             streamlog_out(DEBUG) <<" pedestal: " << timepedestal->getValue(i)
01350                       <<" pedestal_error: " << timepedestal->getError(i)
01351                       <<" status: " << timepedestal->getStatus(i);
01352           }
01353         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << std::endl;
01354       }
01355 
01356     _timePedestalParametersChanged = false;
01357 
01358     delete timePedestalParametersContainer;
01359 
01360     std::cout << "end update Time pedestal Parameters" << std::endl;
01361   }
01362 
01363   /***************************************************************************************/
01364   /*                                                                                     */
01365   /*                                                                                     */
01366   /*                                                                                     */
01367   /***************************************************************************************/
01368 
01369   void Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::updateCellQuality()
01370   {
01371     std::cout << "update CellQuality" << std::endl;
01372 
01373     if (!_cellQualityCol)
01374       {
01375         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update bad cells, collection is not valid." << std::endl;
01376         throw StopProcessingException(this);
01377       }
01378 
01379     MappedContainer<CellQuality> *cellQualityContainer = new MappedContainer<CellQuality>(_mapper);
01380     for (int i = 0; i < _cellQualityCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
01381       {
01382         CellQuality *cellQuality = new CellQuality(_cellQualityCol->getElementAt(i));
01383 
01384         try
01385           {
01386             cellQualityContainer->fillByModuleID(cellQuality->getCellID(), cellQuality);
01387           }
01388         catch(BadDataException& e)
01389           {
01390             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " updateCellQuality(): invalid module id " << cellQuality->getCellID()
01391                          <<", maybe incomplete installation "<<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
01392           }
01393       }
01394 
01395     for ( std::vector<Ahc2Calibrations*>::iterator iter = _allCalibrations.begin(); iter != _allCalibrations.end(); ++iter)
01396       {
01397         int ID = (*iter)->getCellID();
01398         Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits bits = Ahc2CalibrationStatusBits( (*iter)->getStatus() );
01399 
01400         CellQuality *cellQuality = cellQualityContainer->getByCellID(ID);
01401         if (cellQuality != NULL) bits.setDead();
01402         else bits.setDead(false);
01403 
01404         (*iter)->setStatus(bits.getInt());
01405       }
01406 
01407     _cellQualityChanged = false;
01408     delete cellQualityContainer;
01409 
01410     std::cout << "end update CellQuality" << std::endl;
01411 
01412   }
01413 
01414 
01415   /***************************************************************************************/
01416   /*                                                                                     */
01417   /*                                                                                     */
01418   /*                                                                                     */
01419   /***************************************************************************************/
01420   void Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::updateMapping()
01421   {
01422     // clear all objects in the container
01423     _container->clear();
01424 
01425     
01426     //initialise the container with SiPMCalibration objects for all valid cellIDs
01427 
01428     for ( CellIterator iter = _mapper->begin(); iter != _mapper->end(); ++iter)
01429       {
01430         int cellID = *iter;
01431         Ahc2Calibrations *thisCell = new Ahc2Calibrations();
01432         thisCell->setCellID( cellID );
01433         thisCell->setCellIDEncoding( _mapper->getDecoder()->getCellIDEncoding() );
01434         _container->fillByCellID( cellID, thisCell );
01435       }
01436 
01437     _allCalibrations = _container->getAllElements();
01438   }
01439 
01440 
01441   /***************************************************************************************/
01442   /*                                                                                     */
01443   /*                                                                                     */
01444   /*                                                                                     */
01445   /***************************************************************************************/
01446   void Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::processEvent( LCEvent *evt )
01447   {
01448     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"\n\n EVENT: "<<evt->getEventNumber()<<std::endl;
01449 
01450     if (_mapperVersion != _mapper->getVersion()) this->updateMapping();
01451     _mapperVersion = _mapper->getVersion();
01452 
01453     // checks if rebuilding of calibration constants is necessary
01454     if (_MIPConstantChanged  || _MIPSlopeChanged)  updateMIPCalibration();
01455     if (_gainConstantChanged || _gainSlopeChanged) updateGainCalibration();
01456     if (_pedestalChanged)         updatePedestal();
01457     if (_temperatureChanged)      updateTemperature();
01458     if (_interCalibrationChanged) updateInterCalibration();
01459     if (_PhysicsCalibICChanged) updatePhysicsCalibIC();
01460     if (_saturationParametersChanged ) updateSaturationParameters();
01461     if (_timeSlopesParametersChanged ) updateTimeSlopesParameters();
01462     if (_timePedestalParametersChanged ) updateTimePedestalParameters();
01463     if (_cellQualityChanged)      updateCellQuality();
01464 
01465   }
01466 
01467 
01468 
01469   /***************************************************************************************/
01470   /*                                                                                     */
01471   /*                                                                                     */
01472   /*                                                                                     */
01473   /***************************************************************************************/
01474   void Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor::end()
01475   {
01476     delete _Ahc2CalibrationsContainerMap[name()];
01477     _Ahc2CalibrationsContainerMap.erase(name());
01478     _container = NULL;
01479   }
01480

01482   /***************************************************************************************
01483    * create instance to make processor known to Marlin
01484    * should be very last thing to do, to prevent order problems during
01485    * deletion of static objects.
01486    ***************************************************************************************/
01487   Ahc2CalibrationsProcessor aAhc2CalibrationsProcessor;
01488
